Package controller

Class PriceManager

java.lang.Object
controller.PriceManager
public class PriceManager
extends java.lang.Object
The class use to manage the price of tickets, calculate price of tickets. Used to manage the rates for different days, ticket type or cinema types. Used to manage public holidays.
Author:
Yew Wei Chee
